devdoc.author: Alexander R. D'Alessandro
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

claimBadge(uint256).details: require is used to make sure the user looking to claim the badge has enough Zoodle

params.id: the id of the badge that the user is looking to claim

getBadge(uint256).details: Can be used upon frontend load to populate badge data

params.id: the id of the badge that we want to retrieve data for

getUpgrades().details: Can be used upon frontend to load mining power

returns._0: the mining power of the user

giftZoodle(address,uint256).details: used onlyOwner to make sure function is only accessed by owner

params.giftAmount: amount of Zoodle to be gifted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

purchaseItem1().details: require is used to make sure the user looking to purchase item has enough zoodle accumulated

purchaseItem2().details: require is used to make sure the user looking to purchase item has enough zoodle accumulated

purchaseItem3().details: require is used to make sure the user looking to purchase item has enough zoodle accumulated

purchaseItem4().details: require is used to make sure the user looking to purchase item has enough zoodle accumulated

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.upgradesAccrued: the amount of mining power the user accrued on the frontend
params.zoodleAccrued: the amount of zoodle the user mined on frontend

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: A contract for managing user profiles for the blockchain based game Zoodle Clicker
